com.android.ex.photo

Class Intents.PhotoViewIntentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.ex.photo.Intents.PhotoViewIntentBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Intents

    public static class Intents.PhotoViewIntentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder to create a photo view intent

      • setResolvedPhotoUri

        public Intents.PhotoViewIntentBuilder setResolvedPhotoUri(java.lang.String resolvedPhotoUri)
        Sets the resolved photo URI. This method is for the case where the URI given to PhotoViewActivity points directly to a single image and does not need to be resolved via a query to the ContentProvider. If this value is set, it supersedes setPhotosUri(String).

      • setThumbnailUri

        public Intents.PhotoViewIntentBuilder setThumbnailUri(java.lang.String thumbnailUri)
        Sets the URI for a thumbnail preview of the photo.
